"Jeff! Jeff! I have finished the teleporter. Do you want to come and see it?" I ask Jeff enthusiastically. He continues to pass me to head in to the house with his phone in hand. He's texting someone.
         "Uh maybe later, Dad. Got homework." he replies.
         "O-oh, okay." I said sort of wishing he'd have paid attention to what I had created for him.

         My teleportation device has been in the works for many years and I have just figured out the missing link. I have fixed it with complete accuracy. I just want to try it out on someone and I can't do that on my own because I can't stand in the machine and flip the switch at the same time. I have asked my daughter who was busy at cheerleading and football games this year and now Jeff has pretty much turned me down. Have I lost my children's interest? Have I lost who my children are? Why do they not care about what I care about? Can they see the possibilities with this machine? I slowly walked into the house and found my family sitting around the kitchen island. I noticed that the house had been cleaned and there were things in this house I did not recognize.Who are the pictures on the fridge? Where did the kids drawings go? Am I in the right house? Had my family moved since I began working on my teleportation invention.

         "Mom, I need some help with my calculus homework." Samantha stated.
         "No. She promised to help me with my english homework first." Jeff replied.
         "Wait!" Ami hollered. "Honey is there something you need?" She looked at me like had been standing there for nothing.
         "Uh, yea! I finished my invention and I need a human test. Who wants to go first?" I asked clapping my hands together and rubbing them expectantly.
         "Not me." said Ami. "I have supper to make."
         "I have other things to do, Dad." Samantha replied sounding bored and walking off with her backpack in hand.
         "Come on Jeff, how about we find out where I can take you." I was really hoping that we would agree so I could try this on someone in the family first. This way I could prove that my invention works and then I can take it to the science lab and show them and can help my family out in the long run.
         "Yea, whatever." he began to walk off then turned around. "Mom, if I'm not back in 10 minutes, please come save me." Jeff said with sarcasm.
         "He'll be fine. We'll be back in time for supper." I promised. Jeff and I walked outside to the garage where I had been working for the last few years on my inventions. I had created so many good things they just weren't useful enough like this invention. We approached the garage and found the door wide open. The place was a wreck, my workshop had been destroyed.All my tools were on the floor, my electrodes were thrown in the garbage. The chemicals were not touched. At least they knew not to mess with those. By whom? Who would be this diabolical. Who would be this thoughtless and careless? Jeff took one look and said.
         "Well, I guess it's not my turn to get electrocuted this time." He slapped me on the back and walked off. How could this happen? I could only think of a few people who knew what I was working on and were jealous enough to steal it from me. I walked back into the house and called for the kids to come down stairs from their rooms. Ami was still in the kitchen working on something that smelled like spaghetti for dinner. The kids came down relunctantly and wondered what was going on.
         "Can you two come help me with cleaning up my workshop? I would appreciate it." I pleaded. I have been told that my children love to help others maybe that would work in my favor.
         "Dad, we have homework. Mom always said that clean up comes after homework." Samantha stated.
         "Why do you not want to help me? Everyone always says you all are so helpful." I replied.
         "You don't want to know, Dad. Just trust us you don't want to know." Jeff finished.
         "Yes I do. Why won't you help me?" I asked not understanding what they were saying. All three of them took a deep breath and let it out trying to make the final decision to tell me or not. Ami made the decision.
         "Adam, you have not been in this house for over 2 years and sometimes when you really get to work it's longer. Yes our children are helpful. Our children are really wonderful teenagers. Look at them, they have grown up and you have missed most of it with your work. Why do they not want to help you? When have you helped them? When have you put aside what you wanted to do and put them first?"
         "What do you think I am doing right now? I am putting them first by creating something that will change our lives. This telportation invention will change the way we travel. It will revolutionize the airlines, vehicles, and even walking places. I did this for them. I sacrificed for them." I spoke seeing things from my perspective only.
         "Honey, we don't see it that way. We love you and accept what you are doing but you put you first. We did not want the money, the fame, or whatever it is you are searching for. We want you. Spending time with you, getting to know you and you getting to know us is all we asked for. You wanted the fame and glory for some reason. I'm sorry, if they do not want to help you I will not force them. I will though give them the option without repercussions of saying NO."

what does this family do? Do the kids go and help? Who destroyed the workshop and why?

14.content:
You stand in your basement looking over you’re teleportation machine with a huge smile on your face. If this invention works with people your name will go down in the history books as the man who changed the world. People will be able to travel across the world in the blink of an eye and maybe even farther. All you need to do is find someone to test it on.

Just then your daughter Samantha comes down heading for the laundry room. “Sweetheart come over here I need your help”, you yell out. She comes over and with a sigh asks, “What do you need Dad”? You smile point to the machine and answer, “Its done I just need to test it. I need you to get in the pod”. She raises an eyebrow and says, “Right, I’m not getting in there. I’ve seen the movie the fly”. Please, please sweetheart, if this works we’ll be rich and I’ll buy you that car you’ve wanted. I promise nothing will go wrong. I’ve tested it on other things and its worked great. I just need to find a person to try it on”, you beg. You had her at the car. “Ok, ok Dad, I’ll do it, but Mom will kill you if this works like the vacume cleaner invention did”, she shouts.

You can’t believe that they are still bringing up the vacume cleaner. That was an honest mistake and you did replace all the carpet and the walls. Samantha steps into the pod. You set the coordinates for across the room. No need to get too ambitious the first time. The machine warms up and you hit the enter button. The machine begins to sequence her DNA and take her measurements the next step should be to teleport her.

Sam suddenly vanishes from inside the pod and a split second latter she appears across the room in the target location. “Yes, it works”, you scream and run over to her! You grab her and give her a huge hug. She simple states, “Don’t forget about the car Dad”.

Ami hearing the shouting comes running down the stairs fire extinguisher in hand. “What’s wrong”, she asks? Sam answers while walking by, “Dad just tested the machine on me and it works. You guys now owe me a car”. Ami gives you a look that could kill and shouts, “You tested one of your inventions on our daughter”! “Yes, yes honey, but I works. We’re going to be rich”, you respond. You then start explaining the how the machine works and all the possibilities. After just a minute Ami holds up her hand and says, “Just show me how it works Adam”.

You look over at your wife and with a smile say, “See it works perfectly”. As soon as the words come out of your mouth you realize something is very wrong. Your voice sounds just like your daughters. You look down at yourself, however you can’t see much past your BREASTS. “Oh shit”, you gasp! Ami bursts out laughing. When she is able to speak she says, “Way to go Adam, you’ve turned yourself into your daughter”. You run over to the control panel and try to figure out what went wrong. “I don’t understand what went wrong”, you murmur. Ami starts walking up the stairs and says, “Good luck, come up stairs when you’re done. Your dinner will be in the microwave”.

You look over the data. For some reason it didn’t scan you before transporting you. It reassembled you using the Sam’s data because her data was still in the buffer.

You then stare at your bare breasts. You seen plenty of breasts in your day, but never from this angle.

You suddenly feel very weird about standing there fondling your daughter's boob. You jerk your hand away. As you do another voice in your head says, "The real Sam is up stairs. This is your body it's just been reassembled using her pattern. There is no reason you can't touch it." You also remind yourself that since the machine didn't scan you that you may be stuck like this for some time. The gravity of the situation suddenly hits you. Deciding to take a rest first, so you go to the kitchen to grab something to eat. It is weird to walk around your house with your daughter's smaller frame body. Walking into the kitchen you can see your wife is there. She looks at you and says, "Hi Sam, how your day?"

"Ami, I'm not Samantha. I'm your husband," you say and Ami doesn't believes you and says, "Stop young lady, your father is at the basement fixing his machine."

"I think you need to take a look first before you say anything," you say angrily and for your luck that the real Samantha coming into the kitchen too. She looks at you with full of shock and surprise then she says, "Holy shit, who the hell are you? Why you look exactly like me?"

"I'm your dad and the teleport machine goes failure and I'm stuck in your body," you explained and turn toward your wife which is now confusing. Samantha walks to your side and you notice that both of you are the same from head to toes including the clothes that you two are wearing now. Ami says with full of confusing, "So which one of you are Adam and which one is Samantha?"

"I'm Adam and she is Samantha," you say. Ami pulled you to her side and then she says, "I think you need to change your clothes before I get messed up again."

You nodded and then Samantha brings you to her room to change some new clothes as only her clothes can fit you now.

Walking out of Samantha's closet, you say, "Did you wear a white bra with hello kitty themed?"

choices: After giving Samantha her dream body, things don't work out for you as expected.
Of course, Samantha doesn't walk out of the Transport chamber 6 feet tall.
1411322.content:
While five foot tall Samantha is amazed that you've been transformed into an identical looking copy of her, it is kinda weird that you're STILL 6 feet tall. Somehow when the transporter copied her physical form onto you, it also proportionally increased all her measurements. Dropping one of your pens when Samantha walked in, you're surprised to discover that you now have your daughters contortionist-like flexibility. You quickly swear Samantha to silence about this new discovery. You tell her that you want to figure out how and why things have turned out this way. If you still haven't regained your old body by bed-time you plan on having a real interesting session tonight in bed with Ami, whether she wants it or not.

Making busy work to take your mind off of your current predicament you don't notice that Samantha is now mesmerized from looking at a perfectly enlarged copy of herself. She now wants your body more than anything else in the world. After 20 minutes or so of running diagnostics you're really annoyed to discover that you've accidentally designed some interesting quirks into your machine. First off, and most importantly it DOES matter whether the occupant is in the North or South chamber. Apparently the North chamber is the sending unit and the South chamber is the receiving unit. When Samantha first helped you out she stepped into the North unit and then when you used it (to show off to Ami) you had stepped into the South unit. That's why her form was copied onto your body when you materialized in the North chamber.

A little later you're very relieved to discover that it HAD recorded your body measurements so at least you can return to your old body. After having explained all of this to Samantha, all that she's now interested in is, "Daddy, can you now make me as big as you are?" Without any prompting from you she further said, "Daddy, if you do this for me I'll even let you and mom off the hook for the new car you promised." Hearing that really piqued your interest so you then say, "Alright honey, wait here while I check it out with Ami. If she agrees I'll do my best to make you a big girl now." Samantha then gives you the biggest, strongest hug she ever has in her life. Which feels really strange {while you blush a very dark crimson} in your current form.

[Samantha and Jeff aren't identical twins and since 8th grade, Samantha has grown increasingly unhappy. It seems that puberty really hasn't been all that kind to Samantha, at least as far as height goes. While her dad is 6' tall and her mom Ami is a statuesque 5' 10" tall, Samantha has been stuck at 5 foot nothing for over half a year now. With her waist being only 21 inches, Samantha does have a very firm and attractively shaped 32B bust to go with it. What's most frustrating to her tho, is her brother Jeff. He's already 6' 4" tall and still shooting up every month. Every one in the house is on eggshells over Samantha's apparently early end to puberty, or at least her growing any taller. Nobody wants to make her even sadder than she already is.]

A couple of minutes after you've gone upstairs to find Ami to give her the good news {about getting Samantha a new car} Jeff wanders into the lab. Seeing how happy his 'little' sister is puzzles Jeff. Asking, "Say sis, how come you're happier than you were a little while ago?" With a very enigmatic smile on her face she replied, "Daddy's promised to get me the one thing I most want in the world. And just think our 17th birthday isn't that far off." Remembering that she already has a new car coming, Jeff starts to get annoyed that "Daddy's girl" is suddenly getting whatever she wants. And it's all because SHE VOLUNTEERED to be a guinea pig for his new experimental machine. So jealousy now plays a fateful role for Samantha.

Jeff asks Samantha if she knows how to use the machine. She replied, "Of course I do, big brother. Why are you asking. You want to give it a go?" In a surlier voice than he's ever spoken to his sister, raising his voice Jeff, _______ YES I want to. So fire it up and what do I have to do?" Very put out over Jeff's unusually mean demeanor, Samantha was quite tempted to tell him to get into the South chamber. She thought about how funny he would look with her body. But then thinking that her father might change his mind about trying to make her bigger, Samantha told Jeff to enter the North chamber. Which he readily did. Looking at the controls, Samantha saved her previous form in the reserve buffer. However she didn't notice the changes it made to her template. A few seconds later, Jeff is sent the 10 feet across the room exiting the South chamber unchanged just as you return.

At first, wanting to scold Samantha for using the machine without your permission, after a few seconds you instead move to give her a warm embrace. Which sends Jeff running out of your lab in double-quick time. You're quite happy that Samantha is FINALLY showing some interest in your experimenting. Having only told Ami if she agreed to it, you HAD convinced Samantha to give up on the new car. So without telling her what you had replaced the car with {Ami hadn't asked what it was. She only wanted to be sure it wouldn't be anywhere near as expensive.} Telling her it wouldn't cost even a tenth of a new car, Ami gave her approval for Samantha's new 'early' birthday present. You had immediately realized that successfully transforming Samantha into a 6 feet tall cheerleader, even though she would probably be able to wear at least some of Ami's dresses and lingerie, Samantha WOULD need a whole lot of new clothing. Which SHOULD cost a lot less than buying her a new car.

141132221.content:
When Samantha had saved her original teleport template, she didn't notice it changing to her father's dimensions. Which was, of course, what she wanted to happen anyway. However, when she sent Jeff through without first resetting the North's buffer the teleporter ended up compounded your original error when YOU had used it the first time on yourself. So after you first successfully sent yourself through to reclaim your old body, (hoo-rah) Samantha cheerfully and fatefully entered the North chamber expecting in a few seconds to walk out the South chamber only just as TALL as her favorite Daddy. Ami entered the lab just as Samantha has closed the chamber door and she freaks out. Yelling at you at the top of her lungs, Ami lunged at you to drag you away from the control panel. Which turned out to quickly be very VERY, bad for her. [Ami not Samantha]

Since it had been only a couple of minutes since Jeff had been transported, the machine was still silently idling waiting for its next command. Not having yet double-checked the settings, you accidentally hit the transmit button while you were fighting off Ami's attempts at dragging you away from the machine's controls. Ami's distracted when Samantha's body disappears in a flash from the North chamber. You're surprised when she doesn't appear a few seconds later in the South chamber. Having only watched it work once from the controls, you hadn't yet learned that a transference transport takes much longer than a standard one like Samantha's first time through had been. So this time it takes the machine nearly FIVE times longer to both transport and physically increase Samantha's body, to it's new and now maybe PERMANENT (??) dimensions. It turned out to be a good idea of Samantha's to travel crouched in her favorite cheerleader stance. Otherwise, when she reappeared in the South chamber, Samantha would've painfully banged her now much taller head on the roof of the chamber.

As it was, she had to duck down a fair amount to exit through the 6' 6" door. Having seen your travails with Ami at the controls, Samantha immediately jumped to your aid [not that you really needed it that much]. Easily sweeping Ami aside, Samantha bruised several of your ribs when she gave you a very enthusiastic thank-you hug. Ami was temporarily stunned by Samantha's sweeping motion and so sat next to the far wall dis-oriented and dis-shelved. Samantha's so happy with your latest mistake she can't wait to share it with a few of her long-time friends. Running upstairs to get her mobile-phone, within a minute Samantha has sent out texts saying, "Guys, drop whatever you're doing and come over to my house right away! Everyone bring a couple of your favorite swim-suits and some party clothes in a suitcase. For once one of Daddy's experiments has REALLY worked out right!! You've got to see it to believe it. When you get here immediately go downstairs to his lab."

By the time Samantha reappears at the door to your lab, Ami and you have already left for the medical clinic near the High School. Your ribs are becoming painful from the accidental bruising Samantha did hugging you and Ami now has quite a knot on her head where she hit your lab wall. Seeing the two of you now gone, Samantha spends most of the next hour, reading the diagnostics of the past 3 uses of the machine to discover how come she's now a little over 7 1/2 feet tall (2.3 m.), weighing something over 300 pounds, is incredibly strong and has a killer body to boot. Samantha had checked her weight on the upstairs bathroom scale breaking it when it spun past 300 pounds without stopping. By the time everyone has arrived with their packed suitcase, Samantha now knows how come she was transformed into a magnificently strong and exquisitely well-proportioned mini-giantess. AND although they don't know it yet, she's going to SHARE her good fortune with ALL of her friends.

choices: The portal opens. Now, where does it lead?
There is a shudder and the whole house falls into another dimension!
A massive wormhole opens above the city. Now EVERYONE knows!
You find a portal permanently attached to each hand!
You find a portal attached somewhere else on your body, leading elsewhere.
15.content:
With a click the cold lighting flicked on and you smiled. The view of the equipment really made your eye tear. This was the culmination of all your efforts, over five years of work, and the best of your (many) inventions.

Most of the basement room was littered with cables, computers, power systems and other electrical devices. In the center however was the main event. The Focal Chamber. A steel pedestal on a tripod with four large pylons on the outside, pointing to a point just above the pedestal's surface. Here you could distort space, pinching reality with intense, pulsed energy and (hopefully) create a real wormhole, letting you step from this room to... elsewhere. Right now you weren't sure if the aperture controller would work. With that you could manipulate the other end of the portal to change it's location.

Smiling you walked up to the BRB and took a tissue out and carefully polished it. It was so hard to get a really impressive Big Red Button that looked the part.

Taking one last look around your lab, gazing over all your previous inventions, successes and failures, you turned to your greatest effort and...

... Hit the button.
15.title: other

choices: You see a familiar figure, looking back through the vortex.
Despite your care, you trip, and fall, arms flailing wildly for balance.
An electric-blue spark shoots brilliantly from the equipment.
151.content:
A whirling vortex opens in the middle of the pedestal, a sphere of violent grey-white motion, a shimmering rainbow of colours flash around the surface of the ball of wild energy. Checking the meters, you check you're not being dosed with radiation, carefully you walk around the portal. The view is the same from every angle, as you complete your circuit, stepping over the snaking cables.

Peering closer, you start to see vague shapes in the middle of the maelstrom.... Or perhaps it's beyond. Bobbing your head from side to side, you try to judge how far away the shapes are.

Caution makes you check the answer from different angles. But, by the end you are sure. You're seeing through the portal, to the other side. The shapes are indistinct, and you initially think you're just seeing the opposite wall. However, by the third and fourth look, you can see differences.

Your best guess, is it's a parallel reality, a parallel basement. The thought of meeting yourself, or some version makes you feel uneasy. Will you approve? Will they? What'll be different?

Cranking up the energy input, the noise increases a strained whine added to the experiment. You start to see the portal affecting the air, as if pulling it into a whirlpool, and drawing it in.

The sphere surges larger, it's edges just inches from touching the pylons. With a larger surface, you can see more clearly, you walk around the experiment once more... automatically stepping over the cables, your eyes fixed on the dimension beyond.
151.title: The portal opens. Now, where does it lead?

choices: You examine each other with an attempt at professional dispassion.
She seems confused by something about you.
"My place or yours?" you jab your thumb back towards the portal.
1511.content:
Their face is impossible to distinguish, but you recognise the awkward movement. The scientific curiosity, and caution. Stiffly, you raise a hand, and wave. They wave back. As you lean forward for a better view, the portal you does the same.

However, it's the accidental contact of your fingers... and a spark, that throw you into a brilliant white cocoon. A storm raging all around you, throughout your body, moments later, ejecting you to stumble forward.

Crashing into the parallel you, the pair of you fall in a tangle of limbs. The point of divergence is clear, as you apologise, and struggle to your feet. The blurring, dizzying effect of the portal now behind you, the parallel reality too sharply focused.

"I'm... Eve." she offers. Your own hand resting obliviously in her cleavage. Snatching it back awkwardly, "I'm Adam..." your apology more of a stammer.

Straightening up, you tower over her, belatedly offering her your hand to help her up. Your clothes are both plain lab coats, and as Eve steadies herself, you see she's a few inches shorter than you.
